allow: Bash(for vault in Personal Intersolia Goodfeed LifeInside Shopping IT-Services Travel Streaming Sport "Goodfeed shared" "Lifeinside shared" "Intersolia shared" Opzkit ProductQuest)
Bash(# Extract LastPass folders lpass ls)
Bash(# Extract Proton Pass vaults pass-cli vault list)
Bash(# Count items per LastPass folder echo ""=== LastPass Folder Item Counts ==="" lpass ls)
Bash(# Get all LastPass item names \(without folder prefix and IDs\) lpass ls)
Bash(# List devenv items from LastPass echo ""=== LastPass devenv folder ==="" lpass ls)
Bash(# Find ngrok in all vaults for vault in Personal IT-Services; do echo ""=== $vault ==="" pass-cli item list ""$vault"")
Bash(# Test the updated templates echo ""=== Testing ngrok template ==="" chezmoi cat ~/.ngrok2/ngrok.yml)
Bash(# Test the updated templates again echo ""=== Testing ngrok template ==="" chezmoi cat ~/.ngrok2/ngrok.yml)
Bash(# List all remaining templates that need updating grep -r ""lastpass"" --include=""*.tmpl"" /Users/peter/.local/share/chezmoi/)
Bash(# Search for ssh key items across vaults for vault in Personal IT-Services ""Lifeinside shared""; do echo ""=== $vault ==="" pass-cli item list ""$vault"")
Bash(# Check IT-Services vault items pass-cli item list IT-Services)
Bash(# Check if keenfinity ssh key exists in Proton Pass pass-cli item list Personal)
Bash(# Extract SSH keys from LastPass echo ""=== devenv/ssh key ==="" echo ""Private key:"" lpass show ""devenv/ssh key"" --notes)
Bash(# Check full LastPass item structure echo ""=== devenv/ssh key \(full\) ==="" lpass show ""devenv/ssh key"" --json)
Bash(jq '.' echo "" echo "=== Shared-env-lifeinside/ssh k8s key \(full\) ===" lpass show "Shared-env-lifeinside/ssh k8s key" --json)

Bash(# Extract private keys from LastPass in clean format echo ""========================================"" echo ""devenv/ssh key - PRIVATE KEY"" echo ""========================================"" lpass show ""devenv/ssh key"" --json)
Bash(# Extract private key using different method lpass show ""devenv/ssh key"" --json)
